puzzles.name: Start
puzzles.description: Santa was merrily delivering presents on Christmas Eve when he almost flew into a small plane! To avert disaster, Santa had to make a crash landing. It looks like he landed in some kind of laboratory building, but he's stuck and can't find the exit... Can you help Santa figure out how to get to the roof and back to his sled?

puzzles.name: Back to the roof
puzzles.description: The air duct system seems to be the best replacement for the chimney, and they lead to different rooms as well: the office, the coffee table, the meeting room and the main lab. Perhaps visiting all these rooms will help uncover clues on how to find the exit?
